plot: Guy wants to start business of his own by sending old TV-sets to Ghana, the country he was born in. Sophie helps him, not knowing how hazardous such a little export business can get.
title: Finger weg vom schwarzen Mann
plot_es: Guy wants to start business of his own by sending old TV-sets to Ghana, the country he was born in. Sophie helps him, not knowing how hazardous such a little export business can get.
plot_en: Guy wants to start business of his own by sending old TV-sets to Ghana, the country he was born in. Sophie helps him, not knowing how hazardous such a little export business can get.

produce.name: Hochschule für Fernsehen und Film München (HFF)
